product_name: The North Face Terra 55 Pack - Youth
long_description: A long-time scouting favorite, The North Face Terra 55 Pack for youth has been updated with a lighter and more user-friendly design. It offers greater performance and versatility than ever. Fully redesigned Opti Fit(TM) suspension features a refined, anatomical harness with mesh-lined hipbelt; a vertical channel on the deluxe mesh back panel adds ventilation. Aluminum V-stays transfer load weight to the hips; polyethylene framesheet enhances support and provides protection. Huge zippered side entry to the main compartment, separate sleeping bag compartment and 7 well-placed pockets offer easy access to necessities when you're on the move. Hydration sleeve lets you carry plenty of water (reservoir sold separately). Compression straps, trekking pole loops, lash points and tool loops secure extra gear onto pack's exterior. The North Face Terra 55 Pack features a sleek, slimmed-down style that improves load management and reduces overall pack weight by more than half a pound.
short_description: A long-time scouting favorite, The North Face Terra 55 Pack for youth has been updated with a lighter and more user-friendly design. It offers greater performance and versatility than ever.
